attributes.action: Make the sale, production, consumption use of cannabis legal and regulated.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is overwhelming, the truth is coming out about this herb that people use for overall wellbeing, and now treating humankinds most crippling illnesses, to the people that support, much love!!!!! To the people that don't, please do some research and make up your own mind.
attributes.background: This is getting ridiculous now!! So after yesterday's shambles and going against the evidence and fact this brilliant government has decided to bury its head in the sand again, we the people need to unite and hit them with weekly petitions

rejection.details:
The existing petition on legalising cannabis is still open for new signatures until 21 January 2016 so we cannot accept a duplicate. It is still possible for MPs to seek further debates or action on this issue if they wish to do so.

The petition is here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104349
